sqlMap.select:
SELECT cnt_cd, cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_cnt WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg ='Y'
AND conti_cd IN (select conti_cd from tb_conti where conti_cd = #s_conti_code# )
AND conti_cd IN (select conti_cd from tb_conti where conti_cd = #s_continent_code# )
AND cnt_eng_nm like #s_country_name#
ORDER BY cnt_eng_nm

SELECT count(delt_flg) FROM tb_cnt WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg ='Y'
AND conti_cd IN (select conti_cd from tb_conti where conti_cd = #s_conti_code# )
AND conti_cd IN (select conti_cd from tb_conti where conti_cd = #s_continent_code# )
AND cnt_eng_nm like #s_country_name#

/* mDMmCMlOCATIONSQL.xml > "selectCMM_POP_0410_LIST" */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CHARINDEX(cd_val, #s_tp_grp#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END sel_chk, com_cd, cd_val, cd_nm, srt_seq, use_flg, rmk FROM tb_com_cd_dtl WHERE delt_flg = 'N'
AND com_cd = #f_com_cd# ) A WHERE 1=1
AND A.sel_chk = 'Y'
AND A.sel_chk = 'Y'
OR A.cd_val = #f_tp_grp_cd#
OR A.cd_nm LIKE #f_tp_grp_nm#+'%'
ORDER BY A.srt_seq ASC

/* mDMmCMlOCATIONSQL.xml > "selectCMM_POP_0410_CNT" */ SELECT count(A.com_cd) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CHARINDEX(cd_val, #s_tp_grp#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END sel_chk, com_cd, cd_val, cd_nm, srt_seq, use_flg, rmk FROM tb_com_cd_dtl WHERE delt_flg = 'N'
AND com_cd = #f_com_cd# ) A WHERE 1=1
AND A.sel_chk = 'Y'
AND A.sel_chk = 'Y'
OR A.cd_val = #f_tp_grp_cd#
OR A.cd_nm LIKE #f_tp_grp_nm#+'%'

SELECT s_class, loc.ams_loc_val, loc.loc_code, loc.loc_name, loc.loc_tp_desc, loc.loc_cd, loc.loc_nm, loc.nod_cd, loc.nod_eng_nm, loc.cnt_nm, ita.loc_cd AS iata_cd FROM ( SELECT TOP $topCnt$ a.s_class, a.loc_clss_cd, a.ams_loc_val, a.loc_code, a.loc_name, a.loc_tp_desc, a.loc_cd, a.loc_nm, a.nod_cd, a.nod_eng_nm, a.cnt_eng_nm AS cnt_nm FROM( SELECT 'L' AS s_class, a.loc_clss_cd, ams_loc_val, a.loc_cd loc_code, a.loc_nm loc_name, a.loc_cd, a.loc_nm, '' AS nod_cd, '' AS nod_eng_nm, a.loc_tp_desc, b.cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_loc a JOIN tb_cnt b ON a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N' AND b.use_flg = 'Y'
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list d ON d.LOC_CD = a.loc_cd AND d.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y' AND a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_l#
AND b.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd LIKE '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND a.loc_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'N' AS s_class, a.loc_clss_cd, ams_loc_val, b.nod_cd loc_code, b.nod_eng_nm loc_name, a.loc_cd, a.loc_nm, b.nod_cd, b.nod_eng_nm, a.loc_tp_desc, c.cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_loc a JOIN tb_nod b ON a.loc_cd = b.loc_cd AND b.use_flg = 'Y' AND b.delt_flg = 'N' JOIN tb_cnt c ON a.cnt_cd = c.cnt_cd AND c.use_flg = 'Y' AND c.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list d ON d.LOC_CD = a.loc_cd AND d.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y' AND a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_n#
AND c.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND b.nod_cd like '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND b.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
)a ORDER BY a.loc_cd ASC, a.nod_cd ASC )loc LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_loc ita ON loc.loc_code = ita.prnt_loc_cd AND ita.loc_clss_cd = 'I' AND ita.delt_flg = 'N' AND ita.use_flg = 'Y'

SELECT SUM(lcnt) FROM( SELECT COUNT(a.loc_cd) AS lcnt FROM tb_loc a JOIN tb_cnt b ON a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N' AND b.use_flg = 'Y'
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list d ON d.LOC_CD = a.loc_cd AND d.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y' AND a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_l#
AND b.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd LIKE '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND a.loc_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(a.loc_cd) AS lcnt FROM tb_loc a JOIN tb_nod b ON a.loc_cd = b.loc_cd AND b.use_flg = 'Y' AND b.delt_flg = 'N' JOIN tb_cnt c ON a.cnt_cd = c.cnt_cd AND c.use_flg = 'Y' AND c.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list d ON d.LOC_CD = a.loc_cd AND d.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y' AND a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_n#
AND c.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND b.nod_cd like '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND b.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
)a

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ 'L' AS s_class, a.loc_clss_cd, a.ams_loc_val, a.loc_cd AS loc_code, a.loc_nm AS loc_name, a.loc_cd, a.loc_nm, '' AS nod_cd, '' AS nod_eng_nm, a.loc_tp_desc, b.cnt_eng_nm AS cnt_nm, b.cnt_cd, a.stn_no, a.state_cd,
a.loc_nm AS o_loc_nm
CASE WHEN CHARINDEX( #s_loc_nm# , a.loc_nm) = 0 THEN 99999999 ELSE CHARINDEX( #s_loc_nm# , a.loc_nm) END o_loc_nm
FROM tb_loc a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cnt b ON a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list tp ON a.loc_cd = tp.loc_cd AND tp.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_loc ita ON a.loc_cd = ita.prnt_loc_cd AND ita.loc_clss_cd = 'I' AND ita.delt_flg = 'N' AND ita.use_flg = 'Y' WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N' AND a.use_flg = 'Y'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_l#
AND b.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd LIKE '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND a.loc_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
ORDER BY o_loc_nm ASC

SELECT COUNT(a.loc_cd) FROM tb_loc a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cnt b ON a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list tp ON a.loc_cd = tp.loc_cd AND tp.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_loc ita ON a.loc_cd = ita.prnt_loc_cd AND ita.loc_clss_cd = 'I' AND ita.delt_flg = 'N' AND ita.use_flg = 'Y' WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N' AND a.use_flg = 'Y'
AND a.loc_clss_cd =#s_loc_clss_cd_l#
AND b.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND a.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd LIKE '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND a.loc_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ 'N' AS s_class, loc.loc_clss_cd, ams_loc_val, nod.nod_cd loc_code, nod.nod_eng_nm AS loc_name, loc.loc_cd, loc.loc_nm, nod.nod_cd, nod.nod_eng_nm, loc.loc_tp_desc, c.cnt_eng_nm AS cnt_nm
FROM tb_loc loc JOIN tb_nod nod ON loc.loc_cd = nod.loc_cd JOIN tb_cnt c ON loc.cnt_cd = c.cnt_cd
JOIN tb_nod_tp_cd_list tp ON nod.nod_cd = tp.nod_cd AND tp.nod_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE loc.use_flg = 'Y' AND loc.delt_flg = 'N' AND nod.use_flg = 'Y' AND nod.delt_flg = 'N' AND c.use_flg = 'Y' AND c.delt_flg = 'N'
AND c.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND loc.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND nod.nod_cd like '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND nod.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
ORDER BY nod.nod_cd ASC, nod.nod_eng_nm ASC

SELECT COUNT(nod.nod_cd) FROM tb_loc loc JOIN tb_nod nod ON loc.loc_cd = nod.loc_cd JOIN tb_cnt c ON loc.cnt_cd = c.cnt_cd
JOIN tb_nod_tp_cd_list tp ON nod.nod_cd = tp.nod_cd AND tp.nod_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_code#
WHERE loc.use_flg = 'Y' AND loc.delt_flg = 'N' AND nod.use_flg = 'Y' AND nod.delt_flg = 'N' AND c.use_flg = 'Y' AND c.delt_flg = 'N'
AND c.conti_cd = #s_subconti_cd#
AND loc.cnt_cd =#s_cnt_cd#
AND nod.nod_cd like '%'+#s_loc_cd#+'%'
AND nod.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
SELECT a.conti_cd, a.eng_nm FROM (SELECT '' conti_cd, 'ALL' eng_nm UNION all SELECT conti_cd, eng_nm FROM tb_conti WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg = 'Y' AND conti_clss_cd= 'S' ) a
SELECT a.conti_cd, a.eng_nm FROM (SELECT '' conti_cd, '<Select>' eng_nm UNION all SELECT conti_cd, eng_nm FROM tb_conti WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg = 'Y' AND conti_clss_cd = 'C' ) a
SELECT a.cd_val, a.cd_nm FROM ( SELECT '' cd_val, '<Select>' cd_nm UNION all SELECT cd_val, cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl WHERE use_flg = 'Y' AND delt_flg = 'N' AND com_cd = #com_cd# ) a

SELECT conti_cd, conti_clss_cd, locl_nm, eng_nm, use_flg, prnt_conti_cd, descr, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms, delt_flg FROM tb_conti WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND conti_clss_cd = 'C'
AND ( locl_nm LIKE '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' OR eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND use_flg = #s_use_flg#
ORDER BY conti_cd ASC

SELECT count(conti_cd) FROM tb_conti WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND conti_clss_cd = 'C'
AND ( locl_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' OR eng_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND use_flg = #s_use_flg#
SELECT conti_cd FROM tb_conti WHERE conti_cd = #s_conti_cd#
SELECT conti_cd, locl_nm FROM tb_conti WHERE prnt_conti_cd = #s_prnt_conti_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_conti ( conti_cd , conti_clss_cd , locl_nm , eng_nm , use_flg , rgst_usrid , rgst_ofc_cd , rgst_tms , modi_usrid , modi_ofc_cd , modi_tms , delt_flg , descr ) VALUES ( #i_conti_cd# , 'C' , #i_locl_nm# , #i_eng_nm# , #i_use_flg# , #i_rgst_usrid# , #i_rgst_ofc_cd# , getdate() , #i_modi_usrid# , #i_modi_ofc_cd# , GETUTCDATE() , 'N' , #i_desc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_conti SET locl_nm = #i_locl_nm# , eng_nm = #i_eng_nm# , use_flg = #i_use_flg# , descr = #i_desc# , modi_usrid = #i_modi_usrid# , modi_ofc_cd = #i_modi_ofc_cd# , modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE conti_cd = #i_conti_cd# AND conti_clss_cd = 'C'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.conti_cd, a.conti_clss_cd, a.locl_nm, a.eng_nm, a.use_flg, a.prnt_conti_cd, a.descr, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, a.rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, a.modi_tms, a.delt_flg, ( SELECT b.locl_nm FROM tb_conti b WHERE b.conti_cd = a.prnt_conti_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N' AND b.conti_clss_cd = 'C' ) AS prnt_conti_nm FROM tb_conti a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N' AND a.conti_clss_cd = 'S'
AND ( locl_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' OR eng_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND prnt_conti_cd = #s_conti_cd#
ORDER BY conti_cd ASC

SELECT count(conti_cd) FROM tb_conti WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND conti_clss_cd = 'S'
AND ( locl_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' OR eng_nm like '%'+#s_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND prnt_conti_cd = #s_conti_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_conti ( conti_cd , conti_clss_cd , locl_nm , eng_nm , use_flg , prnt_conti_cd , rgst_usrid , rgst_ofc_cd , rgst_tms , modi_usrid , modi_ofc_cd , modi_tms , delt_flg , descr ) VALUES ( #i_conti_cd# , 'S' , #i_locl_nm# , #i_eng_nm# , #i_use_flg# , #i_prnt_conti_cd# , #i_rgst_usrid# , #i_rgst_ofc_cd# , getdate() , #i_modi_usrid# , #i_modi_ofc_cd# , GETUTCDATE() , 'N' , #i_desc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_conti SET locl_nm = #i_locl_nm# , eng_nm = #i_eng_nm# , use_flg = #i_use_flg# , prnt_conti_cd = #i_prnt_conti_cd# , descr = #i_desc# , modi_usrid = #i_modi_usrid# , modi_ofc_cd = #i_modi_ofc_cd# , modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE conti_cd = #i_conti_cd# AND conti_clss_cd = 'S'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.cnt_cd, a.cnt_locl_nm, a.cnt_eng_nm, a.use_flg, a.curr_cd, a.conti_cd, a.descr, a.curr_cd, ( SELECT b.locl_nm FROM tb_conti b WHERE b.conti_cd = a.conti_cd ) AS conti_nm, ( SELECT b.prnt_conti_cd FROM tb_conti b WHERE b.conti_cd = a.conti_cd AND b.conti_clss_cd = 'S' ) AS prnt_conti_cd, ( SELECT c.locl_nm FROM tb_conti c WHERE c.conti_clss_cd = 'C' AND c.conti_cd IN ( SELECT b.prnt_conti_cd FROM tb_conti b WHERE b.conti_cd = a.conti_cd AND b.conti_clss_cd = 'S' ) ) AS prnt_conti_nm, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms FROM tb_cnt a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND ( a.cnt_locl_nm like '%'+#s_cnt_locl_nm#+'%' OR a.cnt_eng_nm like '%'+#s_cnt_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND a.conti_cd like '%'+#s_conti_cd#+'%'
AND a.conti_cd IN ( SELECT f.conti_cd FROM tb_conti f WHERE f.prnt_conti_cd like '%'+#s_prnt_conti_cd#+'%' )
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
ORDER BY cnt_cd ASC

SELECT count(a.cnt_cd) FROM tb_cnt a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND ( a.cnt_locl_nm like '%'+#s_cnt_locl_nm#+'%' OR a.cnt_eng_nm like '%'+#s_cnt_locl_nm#+'%' )
AND a.conti_cd like '%'+#s_conti_cd#+'%'
AND a.conti_cd IN ( SELECT f.conti_cd FROM tb_conti f WHERE f.prnt_conti_cd like '%'+#s_prnt_conti_cd#+'%' )
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cnt ( cnt_cd , conti_cd , cnt_locl_nm , cnt_eng_nm , use_flg , curr_cd , rgst_usrid , rgst_ofc_cd , rgst_tms , modi_usrid , modi_ofc_cd , modi_tms , delt_flg , descr ) VALUES ( #i_cnt_cd# , #i_conti_cd# , #i_cnt_locl_nm# , #i_cnt_eng_nm# , #i_use_flg# , #i_curr_cd# , #i_rgst_usrid# , #i_rgst_ofc_cd# , getdate() , #i_modi_usrid# , #i_modi_ofc_cd# , GETUTCDATE() , 'N' , #i_desc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_cnt SET cnt_locl_nm = #i_cnt_locl_nm# , cnt_eng_nm = #i_cnt_eng_nm# , use_flg = #i_use_flg# , conti_cd = #i_conti_cd# , descr = #i_desc# , curr_cd = #i_curr_cd# , modi_usrid = #i_modi_usrid# , modi_ofc_cd = #i_modi_ofc_cd# , modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE cnt_cd = #i_cnt_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cnt_cd FROM tb_cnt WHERE cnt_cd = #s_cnt_cd#

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ a.loc_cd, a.loc_nm, a.loc_clss_cd, a.cnt_cd, a.ofc_cd, a.finc_ofc_cd, a.use_flg, a.icao_cd_no, a.prnt_loc_cd, a.descr, a.loc_tp_desc, a.td_qty, a.ams_loc_val, a.stn_no, a.un_loc_cd, ( SELECT b.cnt_locl_nm FROM tb_cnt b WHERE b.cnt_cd = a.cnt_cd ) AS cnt_nm, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.rgst_tms, 110) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.rgst_tms, 8) AS rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.modi_tms, 110) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.modi_tms, 8) AS modi_tms, a.delt_flg, a.state_cd, (SELECT x.state_locl_nm FROM tb_state x WHERE x.state_cd = a.state_cd AND x.cnt_cd = a.cnt_cd) AS STATE_LOCL_NM, (SELECT x.state_eng_nm FROM tb_state x WHERE x.state_cd = a.state_cd AND x.cnt_cd = a.cnt_cd) AS STATE_ENG_NM FROM tb_loc a
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list tp ON a.loc_cd = tp.loc_cd AND tp.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_cd#
WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_nm like '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.cnt_cd = #s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
ORDER BY a.loc_cd ASC

SELECT count(a.loc_cd) FROM tb_loc a
JOIN tb_loc_tp_cd_list tp ON a.loc_cd = tp.loc_cd AND tp.loc_tp_cd = #s_loc_tp_cd#
WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.loc_nm like '%'+#s_loc_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.cnt_cd = #s_cnt_cd#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_loc ( loc_cd, loc_nm, cnt_cd, ofc_cd, finc_ofc_cd, use_flg, icao_cd_no, prnt_loc_cd, descr, loc_tp_desc, td_qty, ams_loc_val, loc_clss_cd, stn_no, un_loc_cd,
rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms, delt_flg, state_cd ) VALUES ( #i_loc_cd#, #i_loc_nm#, #i_cnt_cd#, #i_ofc_cd#, #i_finc_ofc_cd#, #i_use_flg#, #i_icao_cd_no#, #i_prnt_loc_cd#, #i_addr#, #i_desc#, #i_td_qty#, #i_ams_loc_val#, #i_loc_clss_cd#, #i_stn_no#, #i_un_loc_cd#,
#i_rgst_usrid#, #i_rgst_ofc_cd#, getdate(), #i_modi_usrid#, #i_modi_ofc_cd#, GETUTCDATE(), 'N', #i_state_cd#
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_loc SET loc_nm = #i_loc_nm# , cnt_cd = #i_cnt_cd# , ofc_cd = #i_ofc_cd# , finc_ofc_cd = #i_finc_ofc_cd# , use_flg = #i_use_flg# , icao_cd_no = #i_icao_cd_no# , prnt_loc_cd = #i_prnt_loc_cd# , delt_flg = #i_delt_flg# , descr = #i_addr# , loc_tp_desc = #i_desc# , td_qty = #i_td_qty# , loc_clss_cd = #i_loc_clss_cd# , ams_loc_val = #i_ams_loc_val# , stn_no = #i_stn_no# , un_loc_cd = #i_un_loc_cd# , modi_usrid = #i_modi_usrid# , modi_ofc_cd = #i_modi_ofc_cd# , state_cd = #i_state_cd# , modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE loc_cd = #i_loc_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT loc_cd FROM tb_loc WHERE loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
SELECT loc_cd FROM tb_loc WHERE loc_cd NOT IN (#s_loc_cd#) AND prnt_loc_cd = #s_prnt_loc_cd# AND loc_clss_cd = #s_loc_clss_cd#
SELECT loc_cd FROM tb_loc WHERE loc_cd = #s_loc_cd# AND loc_clss_cd = 'U'
SELECT loc_tp_cd AS com_cd FROM tb_loc_tp_cd_list WHERE loc_cd = #i_loc_cd#
SELECT count(loc_tp_cd) FROM tb_loc_tp_cd_list WHERE loc_cd = #i_loc_cd#

SELECT A.STATE_CD , A.STATE_LOCL_NM , A.STATE_ENG_NM , A.RMK , A.CNT_CD , B.CNT_LOCL_NM , B.CNT_ENG_NM , A.USE_FLG , A.RGST_USRID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.RGST_TMS, 20) AS RGST_TMS , A.MODI_USRID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), A.MODI_TMS, 20) AS MODI_TMS FROM TB_STATE A JOIN TB_CNT B ON A.CNT_CD = B.CNT_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.STATE_LOCL_NM LIKE '%' + #s_state_locl_nm# + '%'
AND A.STATE_ENG_NM LIKE '%' + #s_state_eng_nm# + '%'
AND A.STATE_CD = #s_state_cd#
AND B.CNT_LOCL_NM LIKE '%' + #s_cnt_locl_nm# + '%'
AND A.USE_FLG = 'Y'
AND A.USE_FLG = 'N'
AND B.CNT_CD = #s_cnt_cd#

SELECT COUNT(A.STATE_CD) FROM TB_STATE A JOIN TB_CNT B ON A.CNT_CD = B.CNT_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.STATE_LOCL_NM LIKE '%' + #s_state_locl_nm# + '%'
AND A.STATE_ENG_NM LIKE '%' + #s_state_eng_nm# + '%'
AND A.STATE_CD = #s_state_cd#
AND B.CNT_LOCL_NM LIKE '%' + #s_cnt_locl_nm# + '%'
AND A.USE_FLG = 'Y'
AND A.USE_FLG = 'N'
AND B.CNT_CD = #s_cnt_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STATE ( STATE_CD, STATE_ENG_NM, STATE_LOCL_NM, RMK, CNT_CD, USE_FLG, RGST_USRID, RGST_OFC_CD, RGST_TMS, MODI_USRID, MODI_OFC_CD, MODI_TMS ) VALUES ( #state_cd#, #state_eng_nm#, #state_locl_nm#, #rmk#, #cnt_cd#, #use_flg#, #rgst_usrid#, #rgst_ofc_cd#, GETDATE(), #modi_usrid#, #modi_ofc_cd#, GETUTCDATE() )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_STATE SET MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() , MODI_USRID = #modi_usrid# , MODI_OFC_CD = #modi_ofc_cd#
, STATE_ENG_NM = #state_eng_nm#
, STATE_LOCL_NM = #state_locl_nm#
, RMK = #rmk#
, USE_FLG = #use_flg#
WHERE 1=1 AND STATE_CD = #state_cd# AND CNT_CD = #cnt_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT STATE_CD FROM TB_STATE WHERE STATE_CD = #s_state_cd# AND CNT_CD = #s_cnt_cd#
